trans-unit.source: Learning path for Hadoop in HDInsight | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Learning path for Hadoop in HDInsight | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Follow this learning path through documentation and resources to learn how to use Hadoop and its components in HDInsight.
trans-unit.target: Follow this learning path through documentation and resources to learn how to use Hadoop and its components in HDInsight.

trans-unit.source: In HDInsight, you can work with big data in the cloud by using Hadoop, HBase, Apache Storm, and customized clusters.
trans-unit.target: In HDInsight, you can work with big data in the cloud by using Hadoop, HBase, Apache Storm, and customized clusters.

trans-unit.source: For help learning Hadoop and its components, follow the guidance in this learning path through HDInsight documentation:
